title: "Radiologists use deep learning to find signs of COVID-19 in chest X-rays"
excerpt: "Johns Hopkins radiologists have found that a deep learning algorithm to detect tuberculosis in chest X-rays could be useful for identifying lung abnormalities related to COVID-19. These findings, published online in the Journal of Thoracic Imaging, suggest that deep learning systems could potentially assist clinicians in triaging and treating ..."
